Intro.Dialogue: My name is Faith Phillips and I am Michael’s mother. I’ve already talked to my husband, and my lawyers are on the way.
I saw Michael leave. I think he wanted to talk to the desk girl. I also saw the garbage man yelling at the naked lady.

My name is Richard Wright. I’m the housekeeper and maintenance technician for the motel. We had a large pipe burst rendering half the motel unusable. I was cleaning up some of that mess around the time they arrived. I did see not long after there was a black suv that seemed like it was circling around, but I didn’t really look into it.

KnownClues.Dialogue: My missing sock! You're a genius!

Intro.Dialogue: My friend’s call me Cherry and I didn’t see a thing. I was just leaving when you got here.

My name is Nancy Reed, and I’m the receptionist for the motel. I was just going about my normal business when a family came to check in. The mother was extremely rude when I told her most of the rooms were closed due to a pipe burst. I talked to Richard a little after that and then the son, the victim, came down. He was clearly flirting, but I turned him down and he left.
I’m Paul. I sleep on the sidewalk out there. I didn’t see anything. I was just looking to see if anyone threw away any food.

KnownClues.Dialogue: Talk to Faith. She's got weird looking shoes.
Yeah I left that on the street. So what?
